title: It shall be permissible to implement the sanctioned Urban Renewal Scheme in phases
clause_text: It shall be permissible to implement the sanctioned Urban Renewal Scheme in phases. The development in each phase is strictly in conformity with the Master Plan/Layout Plan approved for the entire Urban Renewal Scheme.
